ingredients.ingredient: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Soak shark steaks in milk for 30 minutes to reduce any strong fishy flavor
Pat steaks dry before grilling to get better browning and crust
Grill 4-5 minutes per side, being careful not to overcook
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why would you soak shark steaks in milk before grilling, and how long should you let them sit?
